title: Violins for Frankenstein
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about the music man in the White House, how Legally Blonde is a tear jerker, Thomas Guides, and more!

Have something interesting you want to share with us? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or record a message at www.speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
